Author: grimaltonio
Title: [ANN][ICO] Galion, the Ultimate Financial Platform
Body: Galion The Ultimate Financial Platform  WEBSITE | MVP | WHITEPAPER | TELEGRAM | TWITTER | MEDIUM | LINKEDIN | FACEBOOK  Changing the way people track and manage their financial assets, crypto or not, and access world class financial expertise. Unlock the full potential of the entire blockchain ecosystem from a single account, and use it alongside your existing financial assets, taking your financial life to new heights. Galion is user centric, secure and strongly committed to users' data privacy.    Our vision  Galion’s ambition is second to none. We aim to help people navigate the rapidly changing financial world as its being reinvented by blockchain entrepreneurs, by allowing you to efficiently manage all your funds using our unique platform and benefit from world-class expertise.  Manage your entire financial life from a single interface: Galion will allow you to handle all your assets and access all your financial services, crypto or not: bank accounts, crypto and fiat trading accounts, credit card services, etc. Say goodbye to your ten different apps, and make more efficient use of your time. Access world class financial expertise: Galion will deploy a revolutionary financial management platform, powered by the Galion Token to allow you to access the best financial expertise available. Be it general newsfeed and analyses or tailored services such as financial audits or tax advice. Allow your financial life to reach new heights. Empower you to make smarter decisions for your money: Galion will allow you to make informed decisions, by providing in-depth analysis of your portfolio performances, expenses and revenues in a clear interface and point you to the next best move for your particular situation.   Core features  Manage all assets in one place, crypto or not Automatic tracking of assets Cross platform financial management Initiate transactions from Galion Access third party financial services from Galion Get tailored financial advice and services from top market experts

Author: Yura Vorobiov
Title: [ANN][ICO] Galion, the Ultimate Financial Platform
Body: Hi there! We've conducted a primary evaluation of your project and made a SWOT analysis, identifying the lack of escrow agent that would guarantee the return of investments, if the stated usage of funds is not followed and a risk of unauthorized withdrawal of funds through a vulnerability in the code as the main project's weaknesses: https://swot.digrate.com/report/ed305cc9-4a06-47b0-bfe2-06a7ac81235b. Please note that this is not an official statement, we just use it for our internal purposes, the SWOT does not provide deep understanding of ICO and was made automatically based on data published in open sources.

Author: Edouard@Galion
Title: [ANN][ICO] Galion, the Ultimate Financial Platform
Body: Hello!  First, thank you for your analysis. It rightly raises a couple of points that we are in the process of addressing but have not publicized yet, so allow me to share our efforts on these fronts.  Regarding the lack of escrow agent that would guarantee the return of investments if the stated usage of funds is not followed: We have contracted Blockchain Partner, the leading French consulting firm on Blockchain and crypto technologies, to conduct post-ICO third party audits. These independent audits will be released on their terms, made available by them to anyone who wishes to review them, and distributed to every original sale participants. Furthermore, Claire Balva, CEO of Blockchain Partner and one of our advisors, will have a key to the multisig holding the sale proceedings. As both the CEO of Galion and someone who has participated in more ICOs that I can recall, I feel this both creates a powerful check and fosters trust and transparency while allowing everyone to benefit from the company's ability to react to shifts in the landscape.   Regarding the risk of unauthorized withdrawal of funds through a vulnerability in the code: The token-sale smart contract as well as the multisig wallets that will hold the proceeds are currently being audited by Blockchain Partner. Once this review is complete, we will release the code on our Github along with our bug-bounty program, to further evaluate their security.  Thanks again for raising such important points, I hope I have provided satisfactory insights on how we are dealing with them. I welcome everyone's questions and will be happy to answer them!
